fullDescription.intro:
Modifies a column by
adding a time zone to local date&time columns or changing the time zone in zoned date&time columns (without adjusting the time!),
shifting the time zone in zoned date&time columns by adjusting the time (and potentially date) according to the new time zone offset, or
removing the time zone from zoned date&time columns.

tab.name: Column Selection
tab.option: Only the included columns will be modified.

tab.name: Replace/Append Selection
tab.option: The selected columns will be appended to the input table. The suffix of the appended columns can be provided in the text field to the right.
The selected columns will be replaced by the new columns.

tab.name: Action Selection
tab.option: Adds a time zone to local date&time columns or changed the time zone in zoned date&time columns (without adjusting the time!).
Shifts the time zone in zoned date&time columns by adjusting the time (and potentially date) according to the new time zone offset.
Removes the time zone from zoned date&time columns.
A time zone to be set or shifted.
